title: Policy to increase RGDP to FE when wages sticky

content.question: If wages are sticky, which of the following policies will be the most effective in raising real gross domestic product to the full-employment level?

choices.label: Doing nothing, since there are automatic stabilizers
The sale of bonds by the Federal Reserve
An increase in the income tax
An increase in the discount rate

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
